title: provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2024 

(Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2024 (commencement) (no 2) order 2025

title: provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the
heading: In this Order “Act of 2024” means the Planning and Development Act
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “Act of 2024” means the Planning and Development Act 

2024 (No. 34 of 2024).
text_norm: 2 order act 2024 mean planning development act 2024 (no 34 2024)

title: provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the
heading: 3. (1) The 18th day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. (1) The 18th day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the 
extent specified in that Part, come into operation. 

(2) The 18th day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which the repeal of 
the provisions of the Planning and Development Act 2000 effected by section 6 
of the Act of 2024 shall, to the extent specified in Part 2 of the Schedule, come 
into operation. 

(3) The 18th day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
amendments to the enactments referred to in section 631 of the Act of 2024 shall, 
to the extent specified in Part 3 of the Schedule, come into operation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 20th June, 2025.

title: provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the
heading: 1. The amendment (specified at reference number 19 of column (1) of
text_raw:
1. The amendment (specified at reference number 19 of column (1) of 
Schedule 7 to the Act of 2024) of the Transport (Railway Infrastructure) Act 
2001 (No. 55 of 2001) (in this paragraph referred to as the “Act of 2001”) in so 
far only as it – 

(a) 

(b) 

inserts definitions of “Act of 2024” and “Commission” in 
subsection (1) of section 2 of the Act of 2001, 

inserts a reference to section 376 of the Act of 2024 and deletes a 
reference to section 146 of the Act of 2000 in subsection (2) of 
section 42 of the Act of 2001, 

(c) 

inserts “or under section 522 of the Act of 2024” in subsection (7) 
of section 47E of the Act of 2001, and 

(d) 

inserts section 47G of the Act of 2001.
text_norm: 1 amendment (specified reference number 19 column (1) schedule 7 act 2024) transport (railway infrastructure) act 2001 (no 55 2001) (in paragraph referred act 2001 ) far - (a) (b) insert definition act 2024 commission subsection (1) section 2 act 2001 insert reference section 376 act 2024 deletes reference section 146 act 2000 subsection (2) section 42 act 2001 (c) insert section 522 act 2024 subsection (7) section 47e act 2001 (d) insert section 47g act 2001

subsection (2) of section 12 of the Act of 2016.

title: provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the
heading: 9. The amendment (specified at reference number 67 of column (1) of
text_raw:
9. The amendment (specified at reference number 67 of column (1) of 
Schedule 7 to the Act of 2024) of the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick) 
and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024) in so far only as it – 

(a) 

amends section 2 of that Act, and 

(b) 

inserts section 10A of that Act. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 June, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
